HOME.PRE_START: Before continuing you must click on the **{{button}}** button.
HOME.DESCRIPTION:
Start configuring Filo by selecting the category of modules you want to configure and then select the module you want to operate with.

**Do you need a reference guide? Don't worry!**
By **[clicking here]({{url}})**, you'll redirect to the Filo's Wiki, which contains information on how to configure anything.

**Too complicated?**
**[Contact us]({{url2}})** if you have any questions or require any additional clarification.

ADMINISTRATION.LABEL: Administration modules
ADMINISTRATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you in the administration of your server.

COMMUNITY.LABEL: Community modules
COMMUNITY.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you improve the experience in your community.

MODERATION.LABEL: Moderation modules
MODERATION.DESCRIPTION: Modules to help you moderate your server.

HOME.TITLE: Filo Setup Menu

LOADING_DATA: Please wait while the necessary data is loaded.

MODULES.SELECT_A_MODULE: You must select the module from the **{{module}}** category that you want to configure.
MODULES.SELECT_A_SUBMODULE: You must select the submodule from the **{{module}}** module that you want to configure.
MODULES.SELECT_THE_ACTION: You must select the action you want to perform on the module.
MODULES.RESET_REQUEST_WARNING: Are you sure you want to reset the **{{module}}** module? This action can't be undone!
MODULES.MODULE_RESET: The **{{module}}** module has been reset successfully.
MODULES.SELECT_A_CHANNEL: You must select the channel you want to set.
MODULES.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_CHANNEL: You must select at least one channel.
MODULES.SELECT_A_ROLE: You must select the role you want to set.
MODULES.SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_ROLE: You must select at least one role.
MODULES.CHANNEL_SET: You have successfully set the **[#{{channel.name}}]({{url}})** channel for the **{{module}}** module.

DM_STATUS.LABEL: Toggle the status of DMs
DM_STATUS.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of notifications by DM.
DM_STATUS.DM_STATUS_TOGGLED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the DM notifications for the **{{module}}** module.

ADD.LABEL: Add {{type}}
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Add {{type}} to the module's exception list.
ADD.COMPLETED: You have successfully added the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.
ADD.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully added **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.

SET.LABEL: Set the {{type}}
SET.DESCRIPTION: Set the {{type}} list to the module's exception list.
SET.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the {{value}} {{type}} to the module's exception list.
SET.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully set **{{number}}** {{type}} to the module's exception list.

REMOVE.LABEL: Remove {{type}}
REMOVE.DESCRIPTION: Remove {{type}} from the module's exception list.
REMOVE.COMPLETED: You have successfully removed the {{value}} {{type}} from the module's exception list.
REMOVE.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have successfully removed **{{number}}** {{type}} from the module's exception list.
REMOVE.NO_DATA_TO_REMOVE: There are no {{value}} available to remove from the module's exception list.

MODULES.SELECT_A_SANCTION: You must select the sanction you want to set.
MODULES.SANCTION_SET: You have successfully set the **{{sanction}}** sanction

COMMANDS.LABEL: Commands
COMMANDS.DESCRIPTION: Change the behavior of Filo's commands.

CONFIGURE.SELECT_THE_COMMANDS: You must select the commands you want to {{action}}.
CONFIGURE.SELECT_THE_CATEGORIES: You must select the categories you want to {{action}}.

DISABLE_COMMANDS.LABEL: Disable commands
DISABLE_COMMANDS.NO_COMMANDS_TO_DISABLE: All available commands have been disabled.

ENABLE_COMMANDS.LABEL: Enable commands
ENABLE_COMMANDS.NO_COMMANDS_TO_ENABLE: All available commands are currently enabled.

DISABLE_CATEGORIES.LABEL: Disable categories
DISABLE_CATEGORIES.NO_CATEGORIES_TO_DISABLE: All available categories have been disabled.

ENABLE_CATEGORIES.LABEL: Enable categories
ENABLE_CATEGORIES.NO_CATEGORIES_TO_ENABLE: All available categories are currently enabled.

LANGUAGE.LABEL: Language
LANGUAGE.DESCRIPTION: Change the language of Filo on this server.
LANGUAGE.SELECT_A_LANGUAGE: You must select the language you want to set.
LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_SET: You have set the **{{language}}** language successfully.

REPORTS.LABEL: Reports
REPORTS.DESCRIPTION: Provide reporting tools to your server members.

SUBMODULES_SELECTOR.MEMBERS: Change the behavior of the member reporting module.
SUBMODULES_SELECTOR.MESSAGES: Change the behavior of the message reporting module.

REPORTS_CHANNEL.LABEL: Set the reports channel
REPORTS_CHANNEL.DESCRIPTION: Set where you want the reports to be sent.

IGNORED_ROLE.LABEL: Set the ignored role
IGNORED_ROLE.DESCRIPTION: Set a role whose members can't send reports.
IGNORED_ROLE.IGNORED_ROLE_SET: You have set the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as the ignored role successfully.

TOGGLE_DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS.LABEL: Toggle the deletion of reviewed reports
TOGGLE_DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of the deletion of reviewed reports.
TOGGLE_DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS.DELETE_REVIEWED_REPORTS_TOGGLED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the deletion of reviewed reports.

ADD.LABEL: Add notification roles
ADD.DESCRIPTION: Add roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
ADD.COMPLETED: You have added the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as a notification role successfully.
ADD.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have added **{{number}}** roles as notification roles successfully.

SET.LABEL: Set the notification roles
SET.DESCRIPTION: Set the roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
SET.COMPLETED: You have set the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as the notification role successfully.
SET.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have set **{{number}}** roles as the notification roles successfully.

REMOVE.LABEL: Remove notification roles
REMOVE.DESCRIPTION: Remove roles that will be notified when a report is sent.
REMOVE.COMPLETED: You have removed the **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}) role as a notification role successfully.
REMOVE.COMPLETED_ALTERNATIVE: You have removed **{{number}}** roles as notification roles successfully.
REMOVE.NO_DATA_TO_REMOVE: There are no notification roles available to remove.

REASON.LABEL: Configure the reason parameters
REASON.DESCRIPTION: Change the behavior of the reason field of the reports.

SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.LABEL: Set the minimum length of member reason
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the minimum length of the reason of the member reports.
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the minimum length of the members reason to **{{number}}** characters.

SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.LABEL: Set the maximum length of member reason
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum length of the reason of the member reports.
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_MEMBER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the maximum length of the members reason to **{{number}}** characters.

CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_MEMBER_REASON.LABEL: Toggle the cleaning of the markdown of member reason
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_MEMBER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of the cleaning of the markdown of the reason of the member reports.
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_MEMBER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the cleaning of the markdown of the members reason.

SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.LABEL: Set the minimum length of reviewer reason
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the minimum length of the reason of the reviewer reports.
SET_MIN_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the minimum length of the reviewers reason to **{{number}}** characters.

SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.LABEL: Set the maximum length of reviewer reason
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Set the maximum length of the reason of the reviewer reports.
SET_MAX_LENGTH_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the maximum length of the reviewers reason to **{{number}}** characters.

CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.LABEL: Toggle the cleaning of the markdown of reviewer reason
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.DESCRIPTION: Change the status of the cleaning of the markdown of the reason of the reviewer reports.
CLEAN_MARKDOWN_OF_REVIEWER_REASON.COMPLETED: You have successfully **{{action}}** the cleaning of the markdown of the reviewers reason.

EVIDENCES.LABEL: Configure the evidences parameters
EVIDENCES.DESCRIPTION: Change the behavior of the evidences field of the reports.

SET_MIN_COUNT.LABEL: Set the minimum count of evidences
SET_MIN_COUNT.DESCRIPTION: Set the minimum count of evidences that a report must have.
SET_MIN_COUNT.COMPLETED: You have successfully set the minimum count of evidences to **{{number}}**.

ANTI_BAD_WORDS.LABEL: Anti Bad Words
ANTI_BAD_WORDS.DESCRIPTION: Prevent users from using bad words.

ANTI_EVASION.LABEL: Anti Evasion
ANTI_EVASION.DESCRIPTION: Ban those who try to evade their sanctions.

ANTI_EXTERNAL_LINKS.LABEL: Anti External Links
ANTI_EXTERNAL_LINKS.DESCRIPTION: Prevent users from sending external links.

ANTI_INVITES.LABEL: Anti Invites
ANTI_INVITES.DESCRIPTION: Don't allow users to send invites that aren't from this server.

ANTI_MASS_MENTIONS.LABEL: Anti Mass Mentions
ANTI_MASS_MENTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Prevent users from mass mentioning other users.

ANTI_REPEATED_TEXT.LABEL: Anti Repeated Text
ANTI_REPEATED_TEXT.DESCRIPTION: Prevent users from sending repeated text on the same message.

ANTI_SCAM_LINKS.LABEL: Anti Scam Links
ANTI_SCAM_LINKS.DESCRIPTION: Don't allow users to send links that are considered scams.

USER_FLAG.LABEL: User flag
USER_FLAG.DESCRIPTION: Check if the user has the specified flag.
USER_FLAG.SELECT_THE_FLAG: You must select the flag you want to set.
USER_FLAG.DESCRIPTION_ALTERNATIVE: The user must have the {{flag}} flag.
USER_FLAG.FLAG_SET: You have successfully set the **{{flag}}** flag.

USER_REGISTER_DATE.LABEL: User register date
USER_REGISTER_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Check the time elapsed since the user's registration.
USER_REGISTER_DATE.TIME_SET: You have successfully set the time elapsed since the user's registration to **{{time}}**.

USER_DISPLAY_NAME.LABEL: User display name
USER_DISPLAY_NAME.DISPLAY_NAME_SET: You have successfully set the user's display name to **{{name}}**.

USER_NAME.LABEL: User name
USER_NAME.NAME_SET: You have successfully set the user's name to **{{name}}**.

MEMBER_JOIN_DATE.LABEL: Member join date
MEMBER_JOIN_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Check the time elapsed since the user joined the server.
MEMBER_JOIN_DATE.TIME_SET: You have successfully set the time elapsed since the user joined the server to **{{time}}**.

MEMBER_NICKNAME.LABEL: Member nickname
MEMBER_NICKNAME.NICKNAME_SET: You have successfully set the member's nickname to **{{name}}**.

MEMBER_PENDING_STATE.LABEL: Member pending state
MEMBER_PENDING_STATE.DESCRIPTION: Checks that the member has passed the server requirements.
MEMBER_PENDING_STATE.SELECT_THE_STATE: You must select the state you want to set.
MEMBER_PENDING_STATE.PENDING_STATE_SET: You have successfully set the pending state to **{{state}}**.

UNVERIFIED.LABEL: Unverified
UNVERIFIED.DESCRIPTION: The member is not be verified

MEMBER_ROLE.LABEL: Member role
MEMBER_ROLE.ROLE_SET: You have successfully set the member's role to **{{role.mention}}** ({{role.id}}).

MEMBER_BOOST_DATE.LABEL: Member boost date
MEMBER_BOOST_DATE.DESCRIPTION: Check the time elapsed since the member boosted the server.
MEMBER_BOOST_DATE.TIME_SET: You have successfully set the time elapsed since the member boosted the server to **{{time}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS.LABEL: Member total sanctions
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_SET: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_WITH_EXPIRATION.LABEL: Member total sanctions with expiration
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_WITH_EXPIRATION.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has with expiration.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_WITH_EXPIRATION.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_WITH_EXPIRATION_SET: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}** in the last **{{time}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE.LABEL: Member total sanctions by module
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has by module.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE.SELECT_THE_MODULE: You must select the module you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE_SET: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}** and the module to **{{module}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE_WITH_EX.LABEL: Member total sanctions by module with expiration
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE_WITH_EX.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has by module with expiration.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE_WITH_EX.SELECT_THE_MODULE: You must select the module you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE_WITH_EX.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_MODULE_WITH_EXPIRATIO: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}** in the last **{{time}}** and the module to **{{module}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE.LABEL: Member total sanctions by type
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has by type.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE.SELECT_THE_TYPE: You must select the type you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_SET: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}** and the type to **{{type}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_WITH_EXPI.LABEL: Member total sanctions by type with expiration
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_WITH_EXPI.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has by type with expiration.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_WITH_EXPI.SELECT_THE_TYPE: You must select the type you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_WITH_EXPI.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_WITH_EXPIRATION_: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}** in the last **{{time}}** and the type to **{{type}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.LABEL: Member total sanctions by type by module
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has by type by module.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.SELECT_THE_TYPE: You must select the type you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.SELECT_THE_MODULE: You must select the module you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE_SET: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}**, the type to **{{type}}** and the module to **{{module}}**.

MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.LABEL: Member total sanctions by type by module with expiration
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.DESCRIPTION: Check the total number of sanctions the member has by type by module with expiration.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.SELECT_THE_TYPE: You must select the type you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.SELECT_THE_MODULE: You must select the module you want to set.
MEMBER_TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE.TOTAL_SANCTIONS_BY_TYPE_BY_MODULE_WITH_E: You have successfully set the total number of sanctions to **{{number}}** in the last **{{time}}**, the type to **{{type}}** and the module to **{{module}}**.

SERVER_FEATURES.LABEL: Server features
SERVER_FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Check if the server has the specified feature.
SERVER_FEATURES.SELECT_THE_FEATURE: You must select the feature you want to set.
SERVER_FEATURES.DESCRIPTION_ALTERNATIVE: The server must have the {{feature}} feature.
SERVER_FEATURES.FEATURE_SET: You have successfully set the **{{feature}}** feature.

USER_BLACKLISTED_THIRD_PARTY.LABEL: User blacklisted third party
USER_BLACKLISTED_THIRD_PARTY.DESCRIPTION: Check if the user is blacklisted in a third party.
USER_BLACKLISTED_THIRD_PARTY.SELECT_THE_STATUS: You must select the status you want to set.
USER_BLACKLISTED_THIRD_PARTY.STATUS_SET: You have successfully set the status to **{{status}}**.

NOT_BLACKLISTED.LABEL: Not blacklisted
NOT_BLACKLISTED.DESCRIPTION: The user must not be blacklisted

CONFIGURE.SELECT_THE_ACTION: You must select the action you want to perform on the level.

ADD_CONDITIONAL.LABEL: Add conditional
ADD_CONDITIONAL.DESCRIPTION: Add a conditional to the level.
ADD_CONDITIONAL.COMPLETED: You have successfully added the conditional to the level.

EDIT_CONDITIONAL.LABEL: Edit conditional
EDIT_CONDITIONAL.DESCRIPTION: Edit a conditional of the level.
EDIT_CONDITIONAL.COMPLETED: You have successfully edited the conditional of the level.

REMOVE_CONDITIONAL.LABEL: Remove conditional
REMOVE_CONDITIONAL.DESCRIPTION: Remove a conditional from the level.
REMOVE_CONDITIONAL.COMPLETED: You have successfully removed the conditional from the level.

CONDITIONALS.SELECT_THE_CONDITIONAL: You must select the conditional you want to {{action}}.
CONDITIONALS.SELECT_THE_EXPECTED_VALUE: You must select the expected value you want to set.

TRUE.LABEL: True
TRUE.DESCRIPTION: The expected value must be true

FALSE.LABEL: False
FALSE.DESCRIPTION: The expected value must be false

CONDITIONALS.EXPECTED_VALUE_SET: You have successfully set the expected value to **{{value}}**.
CONDITIONALS.SELECT_THE_TYPE_OF_CONDITIONAL: You must select the type of conditional you want to set.

REQUIRED.LABEL: Required
REQUIRED.DESCRIPTION: The conditional is required to be met

CONDITIONALS.TYPE_OF_CONDITIONAL_SET: You have successfully set the type of conditional to **{{value}}**.
CONDITIONALS.SELECT_THE_OPERAND: You must select the operand you want to set.

GREATER_THAN.LABEL: Greater than
GREATER_THAN.DESCRIPTION: The value must be greater than the compared value

GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL.LABEL: Greater than or equal to
GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL.DESCRIPTION: The value must be greater than or equal to the compared value

LESS_THAN.LABEL: Less than
LESS_THAN.DESCRIPTION: The value must be less than the compared value

LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL.LABEL: Less than or equal to
LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL.DESCRIPTION: The value must be less than or equal to the compared value

CONDITIONALS.OPERAND_SET: You have successfully set the operand to **{{value}}**.
CONDITIONALS.SELECT_THE_REQUIRED_CONDITIONS: You must select the required conditions you want to set.
CONDITIONALS.SELECT_THE_REQUIRED_CONDITIONS_OPTION_DE: {{number}} conditions are required to be met.
CONDITIONALS.REQUIRED_CONDITIONS_SET: You have successfully set the required conditions to **{{conditions}}**.

CREATE_A_LEVEL.LABEL: Create a level
CREATE_A_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION: Create a level for the Auto Moderation module.
CREATE_A_LEVEL.LEVEL_POSITION_SET: You have successfully set the level position to **#{{position}}**.
CREATE_A_LEVEL.COMPLETED: You have successfully created the level.

EDIT_A_LEVEL.LABEL: Edit a level
EDIT_A_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION: Edit a level from the Auto Moderation module.
EDIT_A_LEVEL.NO_LEVELS_FOUND: There are no levels available to edit.
EDIT_A_LEVEL.SELECT_THE_LEVEL: You must select the level you want to edit.
EDIT_A_LEVEL.LEVEL_SELECTED: You have successfully selected the level **#{{level}}** to edit.
EDIT_A_LEVEL.COMPLETED: You have successfully edited the level **#{{level}}**.

EDIT_THE_LEVEL_SANCTION.LABEL: Edit the level sanction
EDIT_THE_LEVEL_SANCTION.DESCRIPTION: Edit the sanction of the level.
EDIT_THE_LEVEL_SANCTION.NO_LEVELS_FOUND: There are no levels available to edit.
EDIT_THE_LEVEL_SANCTION.SELECT_THE_LEVEL: You must select the level you want to edit.
EDIT_THE_LEVEL_SANCTION.SELECT_THE_LEVEL_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: Edit the sanction of the level #{{level}}.
EDIT_THE_LEVEL_SANCTION.LEVEL_SELECTED: You have successfully selected the level **#{{level}}** to edit its sanction.

DELETE_A_LEVEL.LABEL: Delete a level
DELETE_A_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION: Delete a level from the Auto Moderation module.
DELETE_A_LEVEL.NO_LEVELS_FOUND: There are no levels available to delete.
DELETE_A_LEVEL.SELECT_THE_LEVEL: You must select the level you want to delete.
DELETE_A_LEVEL.COMPLETED: You have successfully deleted the level **#{{level}}**.

VIEW.TITLE: Viewing the settings of the **{{module}}** module
